name: stay-positive
description: Return 0 if the provided number is negative.

scripts.browser: mkdir -p dist && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify index.js -s stay-positive -o dist/stay-positive.js && ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/stay-positive.js -m -c sequences,dead_code,conditionals,booleans,unused,if_return,join_vars,drop_console -o dist/stay-positive.min.js
